Manifest Those Beers

Next up; it is time to manifest your beers. Here you will enter all beers in your tasting party and will be given a unique ID to put on each beer. This will keep the beers anonymous to everyone!

The steps:

  1. Click 'Add a Beer'.
  2. Enter the beer's brewery and name.
  3. Take the unique ID and place it on the beer. (We suggest putting the beer in the bag to mask the bottle, but we'll leave that up to you.)
  4. Click 'Done' and go to the next beer until you are done!
